'''Picture Commemorating Seirai Island''' is a [[Quest Item]]. Picking up this item initiates the {{Quest|Reminiscence of Seirai}}.

==Location==
Picture Commemorating Seirai Island can be found near a shrine northeast of [[Seirai Island]]'s [[Statue of The Seven]].
